amendatorysection.para: Minibikes, their owners, and their operators shall be exempt from the requirements of the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act, the Motor Vehicle Registration Act, and the Motor Vehicle Safety Responsibility Act.

crossreference.para: Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act, see section 60-462.
Motor Vehicle Registration Act, see section 60-301.
Motor Vehicle Safety Responsibility Act, see section 60-569.
